High-occupancy para-planetary exploration rover (HOPPER)

The HOPPER is forty-four Kerbal stock planetary rover with a full interior, high charge capacity, a ten Kerbal table, parachutes and hide-able science consoles.

Instructions:

1. Drive

2. Use landing gear on slopes

3. Recharge

4. Repair wheels using ladder

5. Repeat

6. ?

7. SCIENCE!

Enjoy! http://kerbalx.com/Mad_Rocket_Scientist/HOPPER

Edited June 27, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist

You sir are amazing! I must find a way to fill it with the kerbale I dislike and have a little malfunchtion with BDs targeting computers

yes this pleases me
Sweet! Another thing to get when my CPU gets fixed. Have some Rep for now.

Thanks for the comments and the rep!

Always happy to receive feedback if anyone has any.
Doesn't the nose look slightly dangerous when on uneven ground?
I haven't had too much trouble with it.(There is a landing gear mounted on the nose.)
